regimen: Apply 20 drops once daily to the scalp either in the morning or in the evening. Massage evenly and thoroughly into the scalp until you feel the serum has been absorbed. Each bottle should last approximately 2 months with proper application.Please Note: Do not apply to eyelashes or eyebrows. Do not exceed recommended dosage.
name: Grow Gorgeous Hair Density Serum Intense (60ml)
description: Achieve visibly thicker hair with the Hair Growth Serum Intense from Grow Gorgeous, developed with a 40% concentration of nine technologies. Grow Gorgeous aims to stimulate the hair and scalp for healthy-looking hair that is protected from external damage, without causing harm to you.

With its Stabilized Dihydroquercetin-Glucoside Complex, the serum contains glycine and zinc to improve hair length for a fuller appearance, whilst a unique form of water-compatible caffeine absorbs into the scalp to reduce hair loss in a small time period.

Its Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3 and Clover Flower Extract Active Complex has been proven to visibly increase hair density by 13% within four months, whilst Bio-Active Pea Sprout starts to work within two weeks to improve hair growth by 78%. Enriched with hyaluronic acid to penetrate the scalp and boost hydration so you can experience luscious, voluminous locks. E.N.
This product is available as Hair Density Serum Intense in certain markets. The product formulation is the same in all markets.

name: NuFACE Trinity Facial Trainer and ELE Attachment Set (Worth $474.00)
description: NuFACE Trinity® device is required to use with this attachment.

Two microcurrent attachments in one kit! Our award-winning, multi-solution NuFACE Trinity® with Facial Trainer attachment is clinically-tested for improved facial contour, skin tone and wrinkle reduction in as little as 5-minutes a day.* Plus, effectively target hard-to-reach eyebrow furrows, crow's feet and smile lines with the NuFACE Trinity® ELE, a targeted microcurrent treatment attachment.
The NuFACE Trinity® Facial Trainer is clinically-tested for improved facial contour, skin tone and wrinkle reduction in as little as 5-minutes a day.*
*ENGAGE Clinical Study
Fitness for Your Face™

Exercise sculpts and tones the body, microcurrent contours and tones the face. Like exercise, benefits are visible and long-lasting with continued use. NuFACE is Fitness for Your Face, the easiest workout you’ll ever do!
Skin Care is Your Nutrition + Microcurrent is Your Exercise.
As we age, our body’s natural current begins to slow down (like our metabolism) leading to sagging skin, loss of contour & wrinkles.

{'date': u'2015-03-12', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'comparing nuface trinity vs mini', 'review_text': u'If you are like me and are trying to figure out which one to get the trinity (full size) or mini get the full size. I got both, but if I was to do it again I would go for the full size. The trinity has more power, the mini just isnt smaller in size it has a smaller battery so you can only do the basic strokes and not 5 sec more. The trinity has a lot more power it can got for 20min and you have the power to do the optional strokes. You just cant leave it connected (like a cell phone and keep on using it when the battery is flat/or low) it turns its self off. The full size also lets you increase the power setting. I have been using it for a month so far, so maybe i need to give it the full 60d for full effect, but unlike others I do not see any immediate result, and expecting that is probably unrealistic. . The difference at this point is probably only one that I would notice. (I am 49 and would like to minimize laugh lines and periorbital area-hollow under eyes). So I dont look like the 19yo girl with perfectly smooth skin on the nuface box just yet. I am hoping that I will see more improvement after 60days. Doing the basic strokes recommended, can be done', 'author_name': u'MJ207'}

People compliment me on my healthy and youthful glow, and I have noticed that my skin has become softer, smoother, and red patches are gone. My previous sensitive skin condition has improved as well.Everyday that I wake up, I find my skin in better condition: rested, hydrated, and glowing. I've never looked better and I'm in my late 30s.This is the best combination you can get with Nuface, the trainer is good for big areas, but you also still need the ELE attachment for more delicate areas.I highly recommend this for all my friends and family.", 'author_name': u'GrandeLatte'}

regimen: Start by selecting your desired speed and heat setting. Rough dry hair until it is 80% dry. Section hair, then place a barrel brush underneath the first section starting at the roots and pull down, always directing the airflow at the brush. When you get to the ends, roll the hair back up to your head and hold for a few seconds. Release and move on to the next section. Continue this process with all sections until your hair is fully styled. For a polished effect and to set the style, select the Cool Shot and blow hair all over with cool air.
name: T3 Featherweight Compact Dryer
benefit: T3 Tourmaline® + Ceramic: Emits negative ions and far infrared heat for healthy, shiny results.
T3 SoftAire™: Delivers a high volume of ion-enriched air that dries large sections of hair—fast.
2 Speeds/Heat Settings: To style all hair types and textures.
Cool Shot: Cool air locks in any style for a smooth, lasting finish.
Dual Voltage (125/250V): Easy-to-use switch for the perfect blowout while traveling abroad. (Plug adapter needed.)
Folding Handle: Offers the same sturdiness and easy grip of full-size dryers, while folding conveniently for easy storage in small spaces.
Concentrator Included: Directs enriched airflow for more precise drying.
9ft Cord with Cord Wrap: Professional-length cord for ease of use.
Lightweight and Quiet: Superlight body and quiet operation for an effortless drying experience.
Scratch Resistant Surface: Designed to resist minor scratches to keep your dryer looking like new.
Travel Tote: Securely stores your dryer for easy packing.
2-Year Warranty: Comprehensive coverage and support options.
description: This speed-styling wonder packs all the features of a full-size dryer in an ultra-light body to make blow drying a breeze. The unique folding handle helps eliminate space-waste, making this petite-yet-powerful dryer ideal for storage in small places or styling on-the-go. Dry hair fast and healthy anytime, anywhere with 2 Speeds/heat settings, a cool hot and dual voltage.
T3 Tourmaline® SoftAire™ Technology:

Other dryers use a hurricane-like, chaotic windflow and high heat, which can damage the cuticle and cause split ends, frizz and flyaways. T3 Featherweight Dryers work differently. A specially-engineered fan generates a high volume of air and weaves it through the dryer at a soft, gentle speed, enriching it with negative ions and far infrared heat. The enriched airflow exits the dryer in a wide cone shape that dries large sections of hair—fast. Negative ions in the airflow cancel static and quickly seal the cuticle, which helps hair retain natural moisture, reduces frizz and enhances shine.

{'date': u'2010-12-17', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Exceeded my expectations', 'review_text': u"i've been contemplating whether to buy skinceuticals products for months due to my skepticsm. but i finally made the jump after i saw a deal on skinstore.com and knowing that i can safely return the product if i didn't like it. my conclusion? i think it's by far the best face product i have purchased in my 30 years. i have tried all of the other expensive products out in the market but never felt as if they lived up to their price- skII, la mer, darphin, and more. i tried c e ferulic for the first time last night following their superclean cleanser, then followed it by b5 hyrdrating gel. my skin was supersoft and it actually looked dewy. i couldn't wait to wake up this morning to wash my face and use it again. i need to wait to determine its effect on my sunspots, but as far as change i feel in my skin's texture after just 2 uses, it hard to believe that it's going to get better and better. i'm a true believer. if this keeps up, i dont think i'll be using any other brands, and that means a lot coming from a fickle person like me. i've never used or praised any other brands. i have a normal/dry skin, hence the reason why i purchased the c e ferulic over the phloretin cf, just an fyi. ive read people complaining of the smell, but i honestly dont smell anything. i guess our olfactory senses differ so you'd have to try before not liking the smell. also, even the bottle's small, the direction advises using only 4-5 drops(c e) and 2-3(hydrating gel), which means that it'll probably last me a very very long time. definitely worth it's price. im absolutely thrilled with my purchase.", 'author_name': u'rosemary116'}

{'date': u'2009-05-22', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Radiance in a Bottle!', 'review_text': u"When I ordered this product I had buyers remorse. Now I wish I would have listened to my mother and never stepped foot in one. My skin had become damaged, but with my newly acquired skin care regimen, my skin has been greatly improved. I've been using this product in the morning followed by SkinCeauticals 45 Sport Spf. At night I use MD Forte Skin Cream III, and always put on Neostrata's very affordable yet effective eye cream. None of this was done with those overpriced skin care lines from Neiman Marcus. I'm thrilled! {'date': u'2008-05-20', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Stopped using it and now Im back!', 'review_text': u"I have to say this stuff is amazing! It made my skin soo clear no lies. {'date': u'2008-05-19', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Great!', 'review_text': u'My doc recommended this to me.  She said she read the research on it and it was really good.  Gave it a try and I now understand why she recommends it.  She uses it also.', 'author_name': u'Pat'}

{'date': u'2008-05-19', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Dont wait until you get wrinkles', 'review_text': u"Here's a recommendation for you! {'date': u'2008-05-12', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Seriously...wow!', 'review_text': u"First of all, I don't understand why people are complaining so much about the smell. {'date': u'2008-05-11', 'rating_score': u'20%', 'rating_title': u'not worth the money', 'review_text': u'smells bad and gives me those red pumps all over my face!', 'author_name': u'snow'}

{'date': u'2008-05-06', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Use it. Love it. Never let it go!', 'review_text': u'I use this product religiously each morning and night. {'date': u'2008-04-26', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Strongly Recommend', 'review_text': u'This product is amazing. {'date': u'2008-04-26', 'rating_score': u'20%', 'rating_title': u'Not for me', 'review_text': u"I bought this product with high hopes after reading the reviews. {'date': u'2008-04-24', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Fantastic!', 'review_text': u'I believe this is the single best product on the market. {'date': u'2008-04-15', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'Vitamins for your face', 'review_text': u'Makes my skin look healthier and more radiant.  I am on my third bottle. {'date': u'2008-04-04', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u"World's Biggest Skeptic is Hooked!", 'review_text': u"Okay, I will try anything once when it comes to skin care with the expectation that I am probably wasting my money. I am 35 and have a lot of webbing under the eye area.  CE Ferulic reduces the appearance of the lines dramatically and my skin looks virant and feels oh so good.  Take it from one who has tried Skin Medica TNS recover...the smell of Ferulic is like a boquet of flowers by comparison.  I really son't notice it at all.", 'author_name': u'Terri'}

{'date': u'2008-04-01', 'rating_score': u'20%', 'rating_title': u'bleh!', 'review_text': u"is no one gonna mention that it smells like hot dog water?  feels greasy, heavy, horrible. doesn't absorb and causes breakouts.  did nothing positive.", 'author_name': u'anisa'}

{'date': u'2008-03-11', 'rating_score': u'80%', 'rating_title': u'Undecided', 'review_text': u'I can only wear this on my forehead and cheeks. {'date': u'2008-03-04', 'rating_score': u'60%', 'rating_title': u'Not Impressed', 'review_text': u"I've went through nearly two bottles of this stuff and haven't really noticed any improvements over my previous emergin-c serum. {'date': u'2008-03-03', 'rating_score': u'20%', 'rating_title': u'Not For Me', 'review_text': u"I really wanted to have the great results I read about in the reviews, but this didn't work for me. {'date': u'2008-03-02', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'It makes my skin more clear', 'review_text': u'I am early 40s and have dry skin, T zone has a little oily. {'date': u'2008-02-29', 'rating_score': u'80%', 'rating_title': u'hot and cold', 'review_text': u'I was so pumped to finally get to try this. My skin hyperpigments like crazy for any reason...even just been rubbed too much (watch bands, etc)..  but I have never had any problems with irritations from products or considered myself to have sensitive skin. Unfortunately, this product is way too strong for me, or I am allergic to it. My face itches like crazy if I use it all over my face. However, I have used it VERY successfully as a spot treatment. I was burned (literally) by an inexperienced waxer, and had a small irritation/burn right between my eyes.. spot treatments with this made it not hyperpigment at all! I was amazed. It has also worked well for me for preventing hyperpigmentation from blemishes.', 'author_name': u'mari'}

{'date': u'2007-11-18', 'rating_score': u'100%', 'rating_title': u'The Best!', 'review_text': u'I have been using this product for a few years and love the results! Use with Hydrating B5! Well worth the $', 'author_name': u'Colleen'}

{'date': u'2007-11-09', 'rating_score': u'80%', 'rating_title': u'nothing noticeable', 'review_text': u"This is probably a very good product for preventative care, however I saw no difference in my skin and I've been using it daily for quite a while now. {'date': u'2007-10-17', 'rating_score': u'20%', 'rating_title': u"What works for many people doesn't work for me", 'review_text': u"I wanted to like the product. {'date': u'2011-03-27', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Gets the red out!', 'review_text': u"I was having problems with horrific acne, to the point that I was taking perscription medication for it. It dried out my skin badly and caused eczyma. I received a sample of Cold Plasma and tried it. I didn't think I'd like it. I told myself I wasn't going to like it. I put it on my painful cystic acne - no burning, no stinging. I put it on my eczyma - again, no burning, no stinging. After a couple of days, my highly inflamed skin wasn't so inflamed and raw looking. Indeed, my inflamed skin started to take on a normal color again. Unbelievable!Over the past year of cleaning up my diet (Perricone), my cystic acne has disappeared and I no longer take meds. I still have very oily skin and I get blemishes but I have continued to use Cold Plasma as part of my twice daily routine, and feel like it has been instrumental in refining my skin texture and getting rid of the redness and marks left by the acne.I have very oily skin, and this goes on with a clean feeling and is weightless. It absorbs into my skin immediately and I don't notice a smell with the product. One jar lasts me about 3 months. This quickly went from something I swore I'd never buy to something I swear I'll never be without!", 'author_name': u'CobraChick222'}

{'date': u'2011-03-03', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Saved my skin', 'review_text': u'I used to have terrible skin. In my teens I suffered from outbreaks of acne. Sometimes my face looked so beaten up I refused to go to school. I contemplated taking Acutane, but the side effects were too risky. Then in my 20s my skin became more sensitive, less acne filled, but still breakout prone. I was diagnosed as having Hyper Sensitive skin. Everything set it off. From the shampoo I used to my laundry detergent. Now looking back I can attribute some of the symptoms (like the acne and breakouts) as pro inflammatory responses to what I was and was not eating. In my mid 30s, I literally stumbled upon Perricone MD. I know this company has been around since the 1990s and I always assumed it was a brand for much older skin. I decided to do some research. I was at the end of my rope, having tried numerous (failed) skincare brands. After reading The Perricone Promise I learned about the anti inflammatory lifestyle and the 3 Tiered Approach to better health and skin. I started slowly. A cleanser (Nutritive) and moisturizer (Face Finishing) were my initial purchases. My skins response surprised me. My skin began to clear and became luminous. Then I tried Cold Plasma and I was hooked. This product is a powerhouse of treatments. Not only did the Cold Plasma rid my skin of its redness, but it started to transform it. My skin became smoother in texture but tougher against the elements. Less sensitive, even more luminous. My pores appearance began to shrink! Cold Plasma became the armor that protected my face from the elements. My experience with the Perricone products has exceeded my expectations. Not only did I gain CLEAR and glowing skin, but I am healthier and happier than Ive been in a very long time. So if youre like I was a few years ago, give Perricone MD a try. To better your success Id also suggest reading his most recent book Forever Young and becoming a fan on his Facebook page. Theres so much information and a very supportive bunch of fans there.', 'author_name': u'Cj71'}

regimen: Apply at night to cleansed face. Gently massage over skin with fingertips in an upward motion avoiding eyes.
description: Like other organs, the skin is controlled by the body’s internal clock, or 'circadian rhythm' which runs just over 24 hours. So when treating your skin, the time of day can make a difference. Clock genes help balance a 'day/night' cycle (or circadian rhythm), but sunlight and aging can disrupt this equilibrium. The basis of internal clock genes in the skin is that in the morning you are protecting and energizing and nighttime is the perfect time to replenish and hydrate your skin. Therefore, there is a need for your body to synchronize this activity with a powerful night cream. Nighttime is the best time to support your body’s repair of UV damage and replenish your skin with moisturization. It’s the perfect time to take advantage of replenishing the skin with what it needs. Recapture-360 Night helps naturally Revive + Improve + Protect your delicate aging skin. It doesn’t matter what age you are! If you are a woman or a man, you need a product that will address the effects of aging, tighten the skin, and reduce the look of wrinkles while improving firmness, smoothness and elasticity.
benefit: Helps support your skin's natural repair process.

reviews: {'date': u'2013-11-25', 'rating_score': u'60.0%', 'rating_title': u"I don't understand Avene anymore...", 'review_text': u'Avene used to be my favorite skincare. It didn\'t improve the skin texture or firm the skin very well, but it does its own job fantastically; it calms down my skin and gets it back to normal so I can use other more effective products. I guess now Avene decides to develop its own "more effective" products to keep its customers and carry way more products than before, most of which, however, aren\'t appealing to me at all. I don\'t understand why a cleanser supposed to be designed for sensitive skins has so much fragrance and dye in it. It is your quality rather than the blue color that calms down our skin, right? The most calming face cream for sensitive skin, instead, got discontinued. And I even started getting allergic to some of the Avene\'s.', 'author_name': u'Lavenderstory'}

description: Rake Comb is made of smooth acrylic to avoid damaging the hair. Mason Pearson Combs are manufactured in Switzerland by a contract manufacturing facility that only makes combs. The same, strict, quality control standards followed in their brush making are applied to their combs. Mason Pearson combs are hand made from the finest celluloid material in the world. This is the same material used to make designer costume jewelry, hair ornaments, and eyewear. Look carefully at the tortoise pattern. You will notice the 3D effect of the shell pattern. This is the result of an internationally patented process that replicates natural tortoise shell.

The material comes to the factory in Switzerland from Italy in a sheet, where it is die-cut into the general shapes of the comb styles. From that point, until the comb is finished, everything is done by hand. Each tooth is cut, one at a time, on a special saw. The comb is then tumbled in a polishing drum to smooth the surface. The next step is hand polishing to remove all burrs, sharp edges, and surface imperfections. Finally, it is buffed to create the high gloss finish.
name: Mason Pearson Rake Comb

description: Relieve your body's aches and pains naturally with LightStim for Pain, a handheld non-invasive medical device used and recommended by doctors, chiropractors, and physical therapists for more than a decade. LightStim for Pain is FDA cleared to temporarily relieve arthritic pain, a variety of minor aches and pains, relax muscles and increase blood circulation. You can use it for post-workout soreness, accidents and sports injuries, backaches, arthritis, and to speed the healing of cuts, abrasions, and bruises. Help your body heal itself! LED Light Therapy was originally used by NASA for accelerated wound healing in space. LED Light Therapy is recognized as one of the fastest growing and most affordable technologies for dealing with temporary pain relief. LightStim's unique Multi-Wave™ technology simultaneously emits multiple wavelengths (colors) of light that deliver unparalleled, professional-grade results in the comfort of your own home. Proven to reduce inflammation, promote circulation and accelerate the healing process, this is a non-invasive way to encourage healing. LightStim for Pain emits a gentle, soothing warmth along with therapeutic light energy that helps relieve tired and aching muscles, improve circulation, and provide oxygenation and nutrients for healing. LightStim for Pain is clinically proven to reduce pain with no negative side effects.

Includes a 3oz tube of LightStim Pain Relief Cream, and a Beauty Bag ideal for daily storage and travel. Maintenance free. No cartridges, LEDS, or battery replacement costs. Five-year warranty. Designed to last a lifetime. Manufactured in the USA at the LightStim medical device-certified headquarters.

combines four carefully selected skincare products designed to gently cleanse and hydrate skin whilst neutralising redness and blotchiness. Ideal for those with sensitive, irritated or rosacea-prone skin.

I don't break out very often however, I use heavy conditioners (Kerastase and Crede) in my hair so if my hair brushes against my face, I'll get pimples. My facial routine is this: Dermaquest Glycocreamy 15% cleanser at night, followed by Glycolix 10% facial moisturizer (both superb). In the morning I wash with Dermaquest Daily Enzyme cleanser followed by this Juara moisturizer, which is the icing on the cake. Not only does this moisturizer immediately hydrate my skin and make it glow, it also alleviated the occasional dryness that I used to (past tense) get from using glycolic products. I have been a faithful user of NV Perricone Facial Finishing Moisturizer for a long time but the Juara moisturizer hydrates even better than that does, which, for those of you who have used the FF moisturizer, speaks volumes. Last but not least, it does not enlarge my pores nor does it make me break out or leave me shiny. I highly recommend it.", 'author_name': u''}

. Packaged in a travel wash bag and crash lock box, the gift set includes everything your skin needs to maintain radiance and vitality.

The ultimate anti-pollution solution containing potent age-defying antioxidants to refresh, nourish and distress your skin with lavender and rose. Its ultra-rich, powerful formula is infused with Mediterranean algae to moisturise skin, leaving it firmer with increased suppleness and an even tone.

A luxurious emulsion infused with Orchid, Vanilla and Cherry Seed. description: The exotic natural butters and oils in Coola's unique Natural Body and Hand Lotion Bars formula maintain a solid form at room temperature. Once gently rubbed, body temperature naturally melts the lotion, absorbing quickly leaving skin soft and silky. Coola Natural Body and Hand Lotion Bars contain an exclusive blend of Shea Butter and other natural oils and emollients to moisturize, protect, and relieve dry and damaged skin.

Shea butter is an all-natural moisturizer, high in fatty acids and rich in Vitamins A, E and F. Shea Butter, commonly known as Karité, is derived from the Shea Nut Tree, which grows in the western region of Africa. In addition to Shea Butter, Almond oil, Avocado oil, Vitamin E and Jojoba extract area encapsulated in a Beeswax base. The Beeswax keeps the natural ingredients working next to the skin, while protecting the skin's moisture.
Coola Lotion Bars guarantee no wasted product, they deliver the perfect amount for each use, and are ideal for travel. Paraben, Petroleum, Sulphate, and Pthalate Free.

description: Sundari's Blood Orange Body lotion is sensually fragranced with a complex of essential oils. More intensely aromatic than the sweet orange, Blood Orange is energizing, refreshing and is balancing. While soothing and cooling it is quickly absorbed into the skin. No synthetic fragrances or dyes. Allergy tested. Dermatologist tested. Suitable for all skin types.

Blood oranges owe their distinctive appearance to a pigment called anthocyanin not typically found in citrus, but common in other red fruits and flowers. Not only is the inside of the orange darkly pigmented, but depending on the variety, the outside may feature dark washes of red. The exact reasons for the unusual inside color are unknown. However, it seems light, temperature and variety are important contributors.

description: This powerful synergy combines soothing extracts of Arnica, Birch and Witch Hazel, with cooling Camphor and Menthol. Multi-functional, this instant revitalizer is perfect for tired legs and muscle tension, especially on the shoulders, neck, temples and across the forehead. Ideal for travelling. Always warm up and stretch before exercising to avoid overstretching muscles and take time to cool down afterwards. Tension in your mind and body can be alleviated with massage and simple breathing techniques. Close your eyes, breathe slowly in through your nose and out through your mouth creating a circle of breath, repeating for 3 minutes. Follow with self-massage on shoulders, neck, scalp and temple or have a professional massage.

For tired legs, massage with upward movements. Can be applied over tights. For tense arms, neck and shoulders, massage in with circular motion. For scalp and head tension place a small amount on the fingertips and gently massage into the temples and across the forehead.

regimen: Cleanser: Wet palms, dispense product into hands and apply in a circular motion to face and neck, avoiding eye area. Rinse well with water. Pat face dry with clean, soft towel. For use morning and/or night. Not to be used in the eye area.Day Lotion: Apply to face and neck, avoiding eye area, each morning after cleansing and toning. If a reparative product is to be applied, do so before applying Day Lotion SPF 15. May be lightly reapplied several times daily as needed without smudging makeup.Toner: Gently mist cleansed face and neck, or spray cotton pad and then apply. Avoid contact with eyes. Spray directly at the nose and surrounding area. For use morning and night after cleansing skin.Face Mask: To be used once or twice a week, after cleansing and toning. Apply mask with a brush or with finger tips to face and neck, avoiding eye area.  Mask should be left on for 5-10 minutes and gently removed with a soft, damp cloth. May be used in conjunction with any cleanser, toner, reparative treatment, and moisturiser appropriate for skin type.
name: B Kamins Oily and Combination Skin Starter Kit
description: The
combines a cleanser, toner, moisturiser and face mask to help balance and refine oily to combination skin.

A mild yet deep-cleaning, oil-free face cleanser infused with natural antioxidants to protect and refresh skin. Gently lifting away dirt, impurities and excess sebum without stripping skin of essential moisture, the non-irritating formula contains natural Lecithin and Quillaja Bark to leave skin feeling cleansed and refreshed and soft. Not suitable for removing eye makeup.

An ultra-lightweight day time moisturiser that delivers veil of hydration and protection to help prevent premature ageing. A synergy of moisturisers, vitamins and antioxidants melt into skin, intensely hydrating and enhancing skin radiant without feeling heavy or greasy. Its lightweight texture won't clog pores, and its protective nature helps to prevent and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

A clarifying toner formulated to purify and balance oily, acneic and combination skin. The mild toner minimises oil build-up, and contains one of the brand's key technologies, Bio-Maple™ Compound (an antioxidant and anti-ageing humectant derived from purified sap of the Canadian Acer Saccharum Maple Tree) to plump skin with moisture and diminish lines and wrinkles whilst normalising skin's natural pH balance. Its gentle exfoliating properties renew and refine the complexion, and a cocktail of plant extracts and moisturisers gently tone and condition skin. Pores appear refined and skin feels refreshed, renewed and balanced.

A rich face mask with calming and cooling properties to help nourish, replenish and hydrate skin. The oil-free mask is infused with mineral-rich Diatomaceous Earth to rejuvenate the face, and one of the brand's key technologies: Bio-Maple™ Compound, an anti-ageing humectant derived from purified sap of the Canadian Acer Saccharum Maple Tree. The moisturising compound expertly rehydrates skin, plumping it with moisture to help diminish lines and wrinkles whilst maintaining skin's pH balance without drying out skin. Its absorbent properties help eradicate excess sebum to for shine-free, healthy-looking skin. Performing gentle exfoliation, the mask delicately renews skin's texture whilst enriching it with hydrators and botanical extracts for a brighter, firmer, more balanced complexion.

regimen: Apply morning and night to cleansed skin, using the applicator, to target specific problem areas on the face and neck, avoiding eye area. DO NOT RINSE.  Start with one application every other night, increase to one application daily, then up to twice daily for best results. Ensure skin is perfectly clean and dry before application of glycolics, as water will neutralize glycolic acid. May be used in conjunction with Renewal Serum (i.e. Morning: Renewal Serum, Night: Glycolic-10).WARNING: The tingling sensation that may be felt is a sign that the product is active on the skin. The sensation tends to diminish with repeated use. Should it persist, or should signs of irritation appear, discontinue use. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of children’s reach.Glycolics can increase sun sensitivity. Sunbar SPF 48 is recommended for use during glycolic treatments. Glycolics should not be applied on lesions or around the eyes. For use on entire face and neck; application period must be controlled. Apply for a period of 8 weeks, then discontinue use for the following 8 weeks (8 weeks on, 8 weeks off).

, a four step sun-care regimen to leave skin protected and feeling replenished with a radiant looking glow. Suitable for normal skin types more tolerant to retinol.

regimen: Use our “Simple Eye Technique.” Apply your darkest color in a sideways V with our Eye Contour Brush. Highlight above the iris in a medium shade with our Eye Shader Brush. Highlight the brow bone in your lightest shade with our Deluxe Shader Brush. Blend well with a clean brush. It's always a good idea to brush the base powder on the eyelid to even out the skin tone and for sun protection. Don't try to match the eye color with a shadow, since this will only cancel-out the eye. A complementary/contrasting color is what makes the eye pop (e.g., brown/blue). Spritz our eyeliner brush with D2O, Balance or POMMISST and pick up shadow for an eyeliner that stays and stays. If you have red or dark circles, stay away from blue or gray tones. They just accentuate the darkness.

regimen: Use one capful of Kneipp Herbal Bath Oil for each bath. For best results, bathing time should never exceed 15 to 20 minutes. Most Kneipp bath therapy starts with water that is body temperature or slightly warmer (98.6°–104°F). Sleep inducing, relaxing baths should be a little cooler, (97°–98°F) and it is advisable to take a warmer bath (102°–104°F) with the onset of a cold or when suffering from rheumatism. Never bathe if you have a fever, and baths that are too hot put a strain on the circulatory system. A foot bath or partial bath is recommended when suffering from cardiac conditions or cold and flu. After a bath, replenish skin by massaging the body with Kneipp Body Lotion or Body Oil. This helps the skin to regain its natural pH balance and form a protective layer.

Use Juniper after sports or any strenuous activity where you are anticipating sore muscles or tiredness due to over-exertion.

description: The FDA-cleared StriVectinLABS Facial Toner utilizes the same advanced electrotherapy used in doctor's offices and high-end spas. Like all muscles in the body, facial muscles need to be gently exercised to preserve the muscle mass and volume that define the shape of the face. The Facial Toner gently stimulates the nerves that control the major facial muscles for a younger looking appearance. In a 12-week clinical study, 94% agreed skin was firmer, 90% agreed face was more toned and 80% agreed face looked lifted.
It's recommended that gel pads be replaced at least once a week as the surface picks up skin debris and becomes dry over time.
With continued use, the Facial Toner restores muscle mass and tone, returning volume to cheeks and giving the appearance of lifted skin.

reviews: {'date': u'2013-06-18', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Please let me tell you!', 'review_text': u'When I called skinstore to inquire about this product I was asked to please write a review on it if I decided to purchase it. When I asked her opinion on what size I should order she told me that the smaller size would be just as helpful and would actually be easier to handle. She was right.I have been plagued with cellulite on the inside of my thighs and rear end since in high school. I tried every pill, cream, and exfoliate I could get my hands on. I even tried that Bliss vacuum contraption but with no happy result. I hesitated at first before buying the Belle but out of desperation, I decided to throw out more of my cash.And hold the phone! Nothing has come close to helping me like this little powerhouse! This thing-a-ma-jig has shocked me!Like always, I wasn\'t expecting much to happen. I had been disappointed so many times by so many products before, my faith was dwindling. But my oh my! Within a week I had noticed that I had lost two pounds and my legs and butt had actually started to look smaller. Could it be? I thought I may had been seeing things. But lo and behold, one week later another 2 pound loss! "Now wait a minute," I thought to myself. I don\'t remember reading anywhere about weight loss. But sure enough...weight and inches lost!I guess its all about the spinning and the vibration. What else could it be?If I were you I\'d save my coins and give it a whirl. Maybe...just maybe...you\'ll get to be a happy camper like me.P.S. Take heed of the instruction booklet where it states to not use on breast. My only guess is... they would probably shrink too! So watch it now! This little doo-dad can be dangerous!', 'author_name': u'Torie'}

description: BelleCore's babyBelle bodybuffer is the travel sized alternative to the BelleCore HoneyBelle bodybuffer. It is small enough to pack in your carry-on or gym bag. This electrical, hand-held tool is designed for on-the-go maintainence to keep the appearance of cellulite under control while you are traveling, on vacation or at the gym.

The babyBelle is equally as effective as the HoneyBelle for exfoliating, rejuvenating and smoothing the skin, soothing sore aching muscles after exercise and decreasing edema by increasing lymphatic drainage. Its smaller pad diameter (4" as opposed to HoneyBelle's 6") does not cover as much area during a buffing session so results for diminishing the appearance of your cellulite may take longer than if using HoneyBelle.
To combat the appearance of cellulite,
5-10 minutes in the morning and 5-10 minutes in the evening. Results are incremental, building over time. For optimal results use in conjunction with a healthy diet and exercise.
Use prior to exercise to warm up muscles and post exercise to flush out metabolic waste, such as lactic acid build up, from stressed muscles that cause soreness, accelerating recovery.

regimen: Dr. Perricone recommends applying in the morning to the face in a gentle circular motion. Follow with moisturizer if needed.
name: Perricone MD Intensive Pore Treatment
description: This treatment is designed to effectively reduce the appearance of enlarged pores. It helps to control and absorb excess oil, maintain skin’s elasticity and resilience while gently exfoliating to remove wax or dirt build-up that can clog and further enlarge pores. An advanced formula, it’s appropriate and suitable for most skin types with enlarged pores: oily, extremely dry, or showing visible signs of aging. Suitable for application in just the T-zone or on the entire face, skin appears firmer, fresher, less oily, and less shiny and remains smooth throughout the day.
reviews: {'date': u'2012-12-18', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Works, so there you go.', 'review_text': u"Makes my pores look visibly smaller and my skin smoother, and my skin is naturally not great. I look at my skin indoors, outdoors, in shade or bright light and it's much better with this product. I've tried other minimizers but always abandoned them. I've been using this for about three weeks and still love it. I did not break out using it. Using the pore refining lotion concurrently is recommended by the manufacturer, but I found using both made my skin look a bit rough. Switching to the line's more gentle toner paired with this product is a good combo for my skin (mature, yet oily/combo, occasional breakouts, a bit sensitive, large pores with rough texture - - a reall beauty! lol).", 'author_name': u'Beball'}

description: Persistent or stubborn acne has met its match thanks to Paula's Choice Clear Extra Strength Daily Skin Clearing Treatment. This 5% Benzoyl Peroxide solution works instantly to eliminate acne-causing bacteria to stop blemishes in their tracks. Unlike most Benzoyl Peroxide-based acne products, Paula's Choice Clear Extra Strength Daily Skin Clearing Treatment contains no harsh or irritating ingredients that can make acne worse, such as Alcohol, Menthol, or Camphor.

description: Give someone the gift of radiance with the Beauty Powernap Kit from DECLÉOR. The floral decorated box hosts a trio of luxurious products, which aim to transform dull and tired skin into a healthy and radiant looking complexion with skin that glows. A power nap in a box.

The Aroma Cleanse Mousse boasts a lavish creamy consistency and was designed to deeply cleanse the face, leaving you with a clear and smooth looking complexion. Boasting a fresh fragrance, the foamy cleanser restores radiance to skin to keep you visibly youthful.

Formulated with papaya extract to exfoliate and essential Neroli oil for its protective and hydrating properties, the 3-in-1 mousse works to cleanse, restore and moisturise. A must have for any skincare regime.
Eliminate signs of fatigue with the Aurabsolu Intense Glow Awakening Cream. Specially formulated to inject the complexion with radiance, the day moisturiser is lightweight and deeply hydrating.

Jasmin Absolute combines with multiple active ingredients to work on visible signs of tired skin, whilst Tamarindus extract in the anti-ageing cream provides moisture and skin softening, helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving skin rejuvenated and radiant.
Decléor Aromessence Neroli Hydrating Oil Serum is a silky elixir of pure essential oils specially formulated to comfort and treat skin exposed to daily stress from the environment.

Thanks to its natural affinity with the skin, the unique formula penetrates the top layer of the skin upon application and seeks to soothe and relax, providing immediate comfort and visible radiance. Aromessence Neroli is the most direct beauty routine available to leave skin visibly smoother and soft to the touch.

description: Achieve the perfect complexion with the
from

, combining four of their must-have treatments to purify, hydrate and lift skin. Expertly formulated with a powerful blend of botanical extracts and Dead Sea minerals, each treatment targets individual skincare issues, aiming to combat dryness, absorb excess oil and improve lacklustre tone, leaving skin looking healthier and restored.

The Purifying Mud Mask works to deeply cleanse and detoxify skin for a fresh and revitalised complexion. Formulated with a unique blend of Dead Sea Mud, minerals and botanical extracts, the face mask unclogs pores and absorbs excess oil whilst adding an intense dosage of hydration. Enriched with Jojoba Oil and Horsetail extract, skin is left feeling moisturized, refined and smoother with a more even tone.

Harnessing the powers of Osmoter™ (the brand's patented blend of Dead Sea minerals), the renewing peel effortlessly dissolves dead skin cells, whilst natural fruit acids deliver high levels of Vitamin C to reignite a natural glow. Skin is left feeling softened and clarified with restored radiance and vitality.

The Hydration Cream Mask has been expertly formulated for dry skin with a powerful blend of Dead Sea Minerals and detoxifying mud to boost skin’s moisture levels. The emollient-rich face mask works to instantly plump the appearance of skin and enhance hydration, leaving you with a smoother and more supple looking complexion with a radiant glow.

This lightweight, gel-textured face mask has been developed with a unique delivery system to lift, smoothen and revitalise skin with ultimate effect. Synergising vitamin-rich Date Extract and Goji Berries, the cooling mask combats dull, lack-lustre complexions, whilst natural antioxidant Dunaliella Algae defends against free radical damage and environmental aggressors. Utilising the powers of Osmoter™ (the brand's patented blend of Dead Sea minerals), you can expect soft, even skin with restored luminosity.

regimen: Apply Photolagen to freshly cleansed, dry, residue free face and neck areas twice daily. Avoid contact with the eyes and test on small area of the skin before all over use. Two pumps per application is all you need (this is a two month supply, 120 treatments). You should not use a toner with Photolagen. If combining Photolagen with other treatment products apply Photolagen first. For best results, use with other AminoGenesis products.
name: Photolagen AGF by AminoGenesis
description: Nothing can prematurely age your skin faster than the sun. It can dry out the skin’s protective barrier known as the stratum corneum depleting it of vital nutrients essential for youthful looking skin. Sun damage is characterized by dry patches, discoloration spots, deep furrowed wrinkles and an overall weathered appearance.

Sun damaged skin needs intensive care. That’s why Photolagen-AGF was created. AminoGenesis has combined its 17 amino acid based formula with sun damage fighting compounds known as amino peptides. Peptides are short chains of pre-assembled amino acids still small enough to absorb into the surface of the skin. These peptides communicate with the fibroblast cells in your skin. Which, in turn, helps address the damage caused by the sun.
The new patented peptide in Photologen-AGF has been shown to be very effective at helping to improve the appearance of dark spots, dryness and deep wrinkles associated with sun damage.

regimen: Skin Balancing Oil-Reducing Cleanser: Use morning and evening. Splash the face and eyes generously with tepid to slightly warm water. Apply a small amount of cleanser to your face and eye area with vigorous yet gentle circular motions. Rinse well. Repeat or use with a clean washcloth to remove heavy makeup. Follow with the appropriate Paula's Choice toner to give your skin a generous amount of potent antioxidants and skin-renewing ingredients. Next, apply your Paula's Choice exfoliant, serum, and/or moisturizer.Skin Balancing Pore-Reducing Toner: Use morning and evening. After cleansing, apply to a cotton pad and gently stroke over face and neck. Do not rinse. Follow with your Paula’s Choice exfoliant, moisturizer, and/or treatment product. For daytime, follow with a product rated SPF 15 or greater.Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant: Dispense approximately a dime-sized amount onto a cotton ball or pad and stroke over clean skin, including around the eyes (do not apply to eyelids or along the lower lash line). This product may also be applied with your fingers. Do not rinse off. Follow with Paula's Choice Clear Acne Fighting Treatment (if needed), moisturizer, and/or specialty product. For daytime, wear under a product rated SPF 15 or higher.Skin Balancing Super Antioxidant Concentrate Serum with Retinol: Apply morning and evening after cleansing, toning, and exfoliating. Smooth a few drops onto face, neck, and eye area before moisturizing (or use alone). For daytime, follow with a product rated SPF 15 or greater. Works beautifully under makeup (as foundation primer) and is suitable for use around the eyes.Skin Balancing Ultra-Sheer Daily Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 30: Apply liberally before sun exposure as the last step in your morning skin-care routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying makeup. For extra sun protection and to create a flawless finish, follow with a Paula’s Choice foundation and pressed powder with sunscreen.Skin Balancing Invisible Finish Moisture Gel: Apply morning and/or evening after cleansing, toning, and exfoliating. Ideal for treating face, neck, and eye area. For daytime, follow with a product rated SPF 15 or greater.Skin Balancing Oil-Absorbing Mask: Use on cleansed skin. Apply a thin layer all over the face and (if needed) neck and let dry for 10–15 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with tepid to warm water. Follow with the appropriate Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting exfoliant, CLEAR Acne-Fighting Treatment, moisturizer, and/or specialty product. May be used as often as needed. Those with oily to very oily skin can use this mask several times per week, while those with normal to slightly oily skin can use it less frequently (once or twice per week, for example).

{'date': u'2004-04-07', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Totally Worth It', 'review_text': u"I have wasted so much money on sunscreens that I could use once, because break out in acne, or have an allergic reaction, or sunburn (even though I was wearing the sunscreen). So I was pretty skeptical when my dermatologist suggested that I dish out $30 for a sunscreen that I hadn't even tested. But this stuff is COMPLETELY, TOTALLY, ABSOLUTELY worth it! I am 21 years old and I have always had very sensitive, fair skin, but in the last year, I have suddenly developed adult acne. Since I sunburn easily, I must wear at least spf 30, especially on my face, but every sunscreen I had tried would either irritate my skin, resulting in rashes or acne, or it would be inneffective and I would sunburn. But this product oes not irritate my skin, it does not sting my face upon application (as many higher-SPF sunscreens do, I do not sunburn, and, not only does it not cause acne, my skin has actually cleared up as I've been using it. For anyone with sensitive skin, this product is worth it; it really works.", 'author_name': u'Mary'}

A sulfate-free, color protecting shampoo that locks-in pigments and creates mirror-like shine. This citrusy shampoo helps keeps color bright, vibrant, and protected while the iconic uplifting scent pampers your hair and your senses. The Rose Hips plant is also known as Dog Rose as it was believed that it could cure the bite of a rabid dog. The plant develops pink and white flowers that yield small round fruits. These are known as hips. Rose Hip oil is rich in essential fatty acids, vitamins and minerals. It has natural anti-oxidant properties and is slightly astringent. Rosehip oil aids in regeneration of new skin cells. It has been known to help improve skin elasticity, regenerate skin cells. Through this action, it slows down premature aging and helps reduce the formation of wrinkles and reduces scarring.
Natural ingredients give this product its unique color. This color does fade over time. The fading of the color does not indicate any deterioration of the product.
benefit: Soothes skin irritations
Long-lasting skin moisturization
Stimulates cell renewal

benefit: Contains G.L.A. (gamma linoleic acid) derived from evening primrose flowers. G.L.A. is known to increase the permeability and flexibility of cell membranes and help regulate water loss. Because the skin around the eyes is so thin and virtually devoid of sebaceous glands, it tends to be the first area to show signs of aging. Fine laugh-lines and the beginnings of crow’s feet can become a problem even as early as the mid-twenties.
Therefore, it is never too early to begin protecting the eye area with G.L.A. Eye Balm.

Contains lecithin. A hydrophilic ingredient that attracts water and acts as a moisturizer. Lecithin is a natural emollient, emulsifier and anti-oxidant obtained for cosmetic purposes from eggs and soybeans.

Contains vitamin E in the form of tocopheryl acetate. Vitamin E is believed to improve the skin’s water-binding ability. It is also the only anti-oxidant known to help prevent lipid peroxidation—one of the major causes of skin aging.
Contains allantoin, a natural derivative of the comfrey plant—recognized for its ability to heal wounds and stimulate growth of healthy skin.
Contains azulene. Extracted from chamomile flowers, it is an excellent anti-inflammatory agent that helps calm and soothe the skin.
Contains Lady’s Thistle. Extracts from the seeds provide powerful anti-oxidants that help fight the free radicals which destroy the integrity of healthy skin cells.

A deficiency of natural G.L.A. may allow too much water to be lost through the skin. When this happens, the skin around the eyes can quickly develop fine dehydration lines and tiny surface wrinkles. Regular use of G.L.A. Eye Balm will help reduce dry skin that accentuates the appearance of lines and crow’s feet around the eyes.

A super-moisturizing, skin conditioning formulation that helps trap moisture. This helps to create a youthful looking brow contour by adding fullness to the cushion of skin just beneath the brow bone.

G.L.A. Eye Balm’s rich blend of natural moisturizing ingredients helps rehydrate the dry, delicate areas around the eyes, helping to restore smoother, healthier looking skin and more youthful looking eyes.
Can be used by both men and women.
The G.L.A. Eye Balm enhances the effectiveness of the vitamin C in the Cellex-C Eye Contour Gel. Used in tandem, these products help create younger, smoother, skin around the eye area.
G.L.A. Eye Balm does not leave a greasy residue. The formulation provides a silky-smooth matte base, perfect for eye make-up.
Benefits can be seen within 3 weeks of daily use.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tallow Glycerides, Stearic Acid, Lecithin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Bioflavonoids, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polysorbate 60, Propylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Evening Primrose (Oenothera Biennis) Oil, Polysorbate 20, Aloe Barbadensis Gel, Chamomile (Anthemis Nobilis) Extract, Lady´s Thistle (Silybum Marianum) Extract, Dimethicone, Sorbitan Stearate, Allantoin, Diazolidinyl Urea, Methylparaben, Disodium EDTA, Propylparaben, FD&C Yellow No. 5 (Cl 19140).

description: - For thin hair or a sensitive scalp.

Developed and patented more than 100 years ago, the Mason Pearson hair brush is the ultimate grooming tool. Only the finest, premium-grade boar bristle, which is gentle to the hair and scalp, is used. Brushing with a Mason Pearson hair brush is the best way to distribute the natural oils while exfoliating the scalp and stimulating circulation to the hair follicles. The patented pneumatic cushion conforms to the contours of the scalp, which optimizes brushing with minimal effort.

All Mason Pearson hair brushes are hand made in England. The animals are not harmed in the collection of the boar bristle. This sensitive boar bristle brush is specifically for brushing thinning hair with a sensitive scalp.

reviews: {'date': u'2010-11-01', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Emulsifies comedones', 'review_text': u"I purchased this in combination w/ the following Sothys products:1.Purifying beauty milk (cleanser)2.Purifying foaming (gel) cleanser3.DesquacremI purchased these products in desperation in the midst of the worst breakout in my entire life.As a (gasp) smoker, I rarely have actual pimples, but I do have tiny little comedones (small little bumps just under skin filled with hardened debris) all over my forehead, temples, nose, & underneath my lower lip. Looking for a product to soften & emulsify these comedones, I purchased a drugstore brand cleansing cream. You know the one, your grandma used it. A week & a half later, my face & neck (grandma said don't forget your neck) exploded with angry red pimples. The random pimple doesn't really bother me, but this was unbelievable. Painful, Embarrassing. More than 50...So, Sothys. Within 2 or 3 days, the tight, painful sensation was subsiding. After 3 or 4 weeks no more raised bumps. After 2 months no more residual red spots. Now for the kicker. No more comedones. I've never been without them. Since, like, the 5th grade or something. My skin is so soft, even-toned, and smooooth. Even when I turn my face from side to side, no bumps anywhere.Here's my regimen. May sound like a whip, but it has worked:1. Two pumps of cream cleanser on dry face & neck before I step into shower. Wet hands, rub, & repeat until gone.2. Desquacrem. It's really creamy, so just a pea-sized bit spreads easily over face & neck. Leave it on while you shampoo, condition, & scrub your body. Then wet hands, rub, & repeat until gone.3. Gel cleanser (just in case conditioner got on my face).4. Barely pat skin dry then two spritzes of toner on my face & one for my neck.Hope you try & love these Sothys products as much as I do.", 'author_name': u'123456789'}

regimen: Take a quick shower; do not soak. Use a body wash or shower gel. Gently exfoliate with a soft washcloth while in the shower. Be careful not to overdo it. Towel dry completely. Apply a light layer of Paula’s Choice body moisturizer. Apply the self-tanning foam evenly and smoothly, one area at a time. Wash hands thoroughly; use a nail brush to avoid tan palms and cuticles. Do not use any additional skincare products for at least one hour after application. To avoid staining fabric, wait five minutes after application before dressing or getting into bed. Your "tan" should develop within 1–3 hours and may continue to deepen for a few hours after that. If desired level of color is not achieved after one application, simply reapply and your "tan" will deepen. Once you are satisfied with the results, reapply every few days to maintain depth of color.Warning: Self-tanners do not protect from sun damage. You must still apply a sunscreen.

description: Jan Marini Skin Research Transformation Serum represents breakthrough technology focusing on TGF Beta-1 (transforming growth factor) and its ability to act as a cellular mediator by signaling certain activities that are necessary for maintaining young appearing healthy skin. Transformation Serum is an oil-free moisturizer that absorbs immediately, leaving a noticeably smoother and more refined texture. Users will experience immediate benefits as well as long-term measurable changes.

Medical studies indicate that transforming growth factor (TGF Beta-1) is unparalleled in enhancing the factors that are critical to healing as well as stimulating collagen and elastin production. Results are rapid and dramatic.

In addition to the benefits of TGF Beta-1, the serum itself in comprised of extraordinary ingredients. We have added Nayad™, Hyaluronic Acid, our unique hydrating complex and a new liposome delivery system pioneered by Jan Marini Skin Research. The micronized liposome technology is thousands of times smaller than conventional systems. So small, in fact, that each carrier bead is 1/20th the size of a red blood cell! Even more dynamic, the new liposome structure is in a time released format so that the essential components of the serum are targeted continuously and precisely over extended periods of time.

regimen: Handle with care. Combustible. Do not light reeds. Keep away from heat, sparks and open flames. Avoid contact with eyes, skin, and clothing. Call physician or poison control immediately. Keep out of reach of children and pets. Do not place bottle, cap or reeds on fabric or finished surface. and clean spills immediately as they may cause stainign and or damage. Place on flat, stable surface. To open bottle, twist counter clockwise and pull gently until cork easily slides out of container to prevent oil spills and cork breakage.

regimen: Read instructions carefully before use and retain for future reference. Remove all packaging and place candle on a level heat resistant surface. Do not burn candle on or near anything that can catch fire. Always leave at least 10cm between burning candles. Burn candle in an area free from draughts. Avoid touching or moving when lit. Never leave burning candles unattended. Extinguish candle if flame becomes enlarged. For best results trim wick to 6mm and do not burn candle for more than 4 hours at a time to avoid smoking or enlarged flame. Keep wax pool free from objects such as burned match heads and wick trimmings. Keep out of reach of children and pets.

Then for your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the Mitt over your hands and feet. Step 3: Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. Step 4: Allow 1, 2 or 3 hours depending on your desired shade, before showering to reveal your developed tan. regimen: Use our “Simple Eye Technique.” Apply your darkest color in a sideways V with our Eye Contour Brush. Highlight above the iris in a medium shade with our Eye Shader Brush. Highlight the brow bone in your lightest shade with our Deluxe Shader Brush. Blend well with a clean brush. It's always a good idea to brush the base powder on the eyelid to even out the skin tone and for sun protection. Don't try to match the eye color with a shadow, since this will only cancel-out the eye. A complementary/contrasting color is what makes the eye pop (e.g., brown/blue). Spritz our eyeliner brush with D2O, Balance or POMMISST and pick up shadow for an eyeliner that stays and stays. If you have red or dark circles, stay away from blue or gray tones. They just accentuate the darkness.

regimen: Use our White Fan Brush or Dome Brush to apply. Rock the brush underneath the outer part of the cheekbone using one of our bronzers. Brush it up onto the cheekbone. Apply a brighter color to the apple of the cheek and brush outwards and down, away from the top of the cheekbone. Blend the two colors together using the brush you used to apply your base. The perfect blush for you is the color of your cheek when flushed. To narrow a face, bring the color into the middle of the face, but no farther forward than the middle of the iris. Two colors create a subtle, sophisticated look. To widen a face, keep blush towards the outside of the face. Harmonize blush and lip color. It gives a natural, pulled-together look.

description: This rich night cream leaves skin feeling dewy and soft. It diminishes the appearance of both lines and wrinkles, while protecting against premature aging. Rich and deeply penetrating cream formula infused with lipids and herbal extracts. It brightens the skin and provides strong anti-oxidant protection and inhibits collagen breakdown and prevents/relieves age spots.

Amalaki, literally meaning "the sustainer", is also highly regarded in India that every spring there is a special day on which the tree is worshipped as being divine. It is easy to see that this holiday is motivated by sheer gratitude for a fruit that has nursed an entire society, throughout the year. In fact, another of its Sanskrit names is Dhatri, "the nurse of humankind". Amalaki has been used continuously in Ayurveda for millennia, and according the Vedas, the ancient books of wisdom, it was the first tree in the Universe.
Use up Rate: 2 months

description: Have the “Monday Blues”? In need of a mental detox? Soak for 15-20 minutes in the intoxicating aroma of red poppy and hemp essential oils. Known traditionally as a mental sedative, red poppy is combined with relaxing hemp to take the edge off a stressful day letting your mind float off to a serene, dream-like place. Our mineral salt is sourced from an ancient underground salt water sea in central Germany that is the last remaining salt works in Europe using traditional pan boiling methods. This method reveals unique salt crystals free from chemical additives and environmental pollutants. Naturally very high in trace minerals such as magnesium, calcium and zinc, which are absorbed by the body while soaking in your tub. A salt bath is the perfect remedy to detoxify the body and exfoliate the skin.

reviews: {'date': u'2015-02-27', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Great Cleanser', 'review_text': u"I received this as a sample in my Glossy Box last month. I really like it. {'date': u'2012-08-04', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Miracle in a Bottle', 'review_text': u"I've had this product about a week. I've been wanting a facial peel, but I was worried about buying a product that was too strong for my skin and would causing burning. I have sensitive skin (prior to and as a result of psoriasis), so I have to be extremely careful of the products that I use. When I got peel, the first thing I did was work the pump so that I could smell the product. It smells deliciously like pumpkin! Absolutely wonderful scent! The first time that I tried it, I didn't feel that I got all that much from it, but I know now that it's because my face was not clean. The second time I used the peel, it was after I had throughly washed and exfoliated my face; I felt it working then! I kept to that pattern for 3 days, and I noticed a drastic reduction in my acne, as well as acne scars fading. Recently, I tried this directly after taking a bath, and the results were more dramatic. My skin is so bright, the tone is becoming more and more even, the scars are fading, the small wrinkles I saw are disappearing, my adult acne is going away...it's amazing the transformation that my skin has undergone in the week that I've been using this product. I do want to mention that I use this product every day; I wash my face twice a day (exfoliate both times), exfoliating both times, but I only use the peel during my night wash. That most likely contributes to the results that I'm having. In addition, I leave the peel on for a couple hours (I'm a night owl) and then wipe off, moisturize, and go to bed. I don't advise doing that if you're not very familiar with your skin and how it will react. my skin is getting better due to my regimen, but I would not suggest others follow it unless they are sure it will actually work for them. I would also like to state that I've always exfoliated, but the results that I've seen did not occur until after I started using this peel. It really pulls impurities to the surface so that you can remove them. I've quite in love with this product, and a little goes a very, very long way, so I'm sure that I'll have this product for a while, even with using it every day.", 'author_name': u'Cole'}

{'date': u'2007-02-05', 'rating_score': u'60.0%', 'rating_title': u'Loved it?!.. not so much', 'review_text': u'I can\'t evaluate this moisturizer on its beneifts, because I am not sure whether the (rather good) condition of my skin is because of my lifestyle and use of other products (cleanser, sunscreen, exfoilator) or because of this moisturizer. regimen: Maracuja is as versatile as it is effective. Use it as a stand alone moisturizer for your skin. You can also apply it prior to applying your moisturizing cream for an incredible effect. Don't worry, Maracuja absorbs really well and does not leave the skin oily. It is a common misconception that the use of a natural oil will create oily skin. Start small. Use a drop on each side of your nose and gently apply with smooth circular motion. Allow the oil to absorb and see if you need another drop or two. Once you determine the application rate, you will know how much your skin needs. Just wipe away any excess with a tissue.Because of the incredible compounds within Maracuja Oil, it is also great for hair. Whether it is revitalizing the scalp or conditioning the ends of towel dried hair, Maracuja Oil can do it all. The best part is that is is 100% natural, with no toxic chemicals. To treat your scalp, apply several drops to the scalp before a shower and massage into the scalp. Allow the oil to penetrate for a few minutes, and then wash the hair as usual. For treating the hair shaft, towel dry your hair, add a few drops through the ends, and style as usual. Remember to start small and slowly build up to your optimum level. One or two drops to start.
description: Deep within the virgin forests of Brazil near the Amazon Rainforest region, grows the Passiflora Incarnata, a long woody vine that produces gorgeous and delicate flowers that yield a delicious fruit known as Passion Fruit. The vines grow up to 50 meters on average. The flower from the vine, Passion Flower, has been used medicinally for hundreds of years with anecdotal results ranging from anti-inflammatory, sedative, soothing, calming and analgesic effects.

reviews: {'date': u'2013-03-24', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'The Best Masque to Clean your Face', 'review_text': u'This is a staple skin care product I have used for many years and will not be without. This is such a easy masque and I have found that it is most effective by using it in the following way: 1) Make sure skin has been cleansed and is damp. 2) shake the tube of masque to be sure the masque is mixed well inside the tube. 3) Then squeeze about 1/2" of the masque from the tube and apply a thin layer of the masque to your damp face (it is very important to focus on the T zone but I use it all over my face and upper neck, avoiding the eye area). 4) let masque dry for about 20 min. 5) Stand over your sink and gently RUB the masque off your face and nose and neck (use circular motions) and particles of the masque (along with dead skin cells) will come off into your sink. 6) when you have finished rubbing the masque off your face and neck, wash and tone your face and neck again to be sure all of the masque has been removed -- and then apply a moisturizer or night cream. This is the easiest way to clean, exfoliate and brighten your face and I use this masque 3+ times a week. This masque also helps control blackheads and whiteheads.', 'author_name': u'louann'}

regimen: Step 1: AssemblyPlace disc on motor shaft. Simply push on tightly. To remove; PullOff. Important: There are 2 disc sizes. One for the body and onefor the face. See recommended usage below. Place the cap overthe disc. Screw 1/4 turn and seal tight. There must be a seal inorder to create the vacuum and suction. Connect cord to unit andpower supply and plug in.STEP 2: Wash Your SkinCleanse and Wash. Remove all oil, makeup, and dirt. Make sure your hair is out of the way andcovered or pulled back off of your face.STEP 3: TechniquePull skin tight for a smooth surface. Place your fingers on the skin and stretch theskin so that it is tight where the tip will make contact with the skin. Keep the unitmoving constantly over your skin.Do not hover in one spot.Be sure the cap is flush with your skin, maintaining even contact. This will ensure aproper suction. The motor sound will change when suction occurs.Small Disc: Use the small disc around tight spots on the nose or where your boneswill not allow suction. The large disc should only be used on the body and not on theface.STEP 4: TreatmentUse light pressure with early treatments. As you become skilled with this tool you can become moreaggressive and use more pressure. Be careful not to grind to deep. Move the disc in upward andhorizontal motions until you have treated all areas of the surface. If you have trouble spots take alittle more time on these areas. Be careful not to press to hard or stay to long in one place. Keep thedisc moving over the surface or your skin.STEP 5: Cell RenewalCell rejuvenation and renewal serums and creams are essential to the healing process andrecovery. Use your choice of products daily in between treatments.STEP 6: Follow-Up and MaintenanceClean the filter and residue out of the cap and motor shaft. Clean with a damp cloth in andaround motor shaft.Replace discs after every two to three treatments. For maximum effectiveness, the abrasive on thediscs must be fresh.Recommended usage: Once a week.Note: The green disc has a coarse grit for more aggressive treatments. The blue has moderate grit.
description: Personal microdermabrasion tool comes with two different sizes of disc attachments, offering two different grits for exfoliation. Vacuum action in the tool sucks the skin into the rotating disc, bringing blood flow and collagen to the surface. Removes the thin layer of dead skin cells so that rejuvenation creams and serums can sink deeper into the skin and work more effectively.
Please note this item is a 110V electrical device.

ingredient: One Personal Microderm Unit. 6 discs - 2 green, 4 blue, with 2 sizes of caps. One electrical cord. One reusable filter.

{'date': u'2010-08-06', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u"It's working", 'review_text': u'I purchased this serum after my skin went nuts this summer. I am 31 and have had mild/moderate acne since I was 13. However, this summer I have had horrible break outs all over my face, cysts on my chin and blackheads covering my nose all out of nowhere. I went from two zits a month to about 20. I must be getting a second round of adult acne just to top it all off. I have every skin care product under the sun, I\'ve literally tried it all, I\'ve estimated that I\'ve spent thousands over the years on name brand, drugstore stuff and nothing in my arsenal worked!! BP, Salicylic acid and sulfur products were really irritating my skin, I was getting rashes on top of acne to boot so I did some research and found this mandelic/malic acid combo that a lot of people seemed to have good results with and it was the one thing I\'ve never tried!I am sooo glad I tried this! I use the 12% serum at night and I was expecting it to be much stickier due to all the other reviews but it is not really that sticky to me, just slightly, as I spread a thin layer. I use the M2 moisturizer with this as well and my skin is seriously evening out and my acne is fading with each use, even those deep chin cysts, ugh. I woke up the first day after using this and my face definitely looked better! It is still bringing some of the stuff in my pores out but I think that\'s to be expected with initial use. My weird facial redness is gone, and my noticeable "raccoon" eye situation due to BC related melasma are looking good too! Another benefit is that my super oil-slick skin is getting less oily throughout the day and I didn\'t think anything could do that for me. Seriously, and this has only been after ONE WEEK.So far I LOVE this stuff! Fingers crossed that it\'s the answer, then I can clean out my bathroom closet and toss about 100 jars of stuff. I will have to update this after I am done with my bottle :)', 'author_name': u'beans'}

{'date': u'2010-06-21', 'rating_score': u'60.0%', 'rating_title': u'Not what it should be', 'review_text': u'I have used the orig MaMa since it came out and loved it. I have tried both versions (12 and 15%) of the M2 and wish I could say I love them as well but I do not. Neither product provides the results that the MaMa lotion did and I don\'t know why they felt the need to "improve" on a product that worked so well for so many people.', 'author_name': u'meh6'}

{'date': u'2010-05-22', 'rating_score': u'80.0%', 'rating_title': u'Effective for Rosacea', 'review_text': u"I use the 12% serum with the M2 Recovery Moisturizer. I have an ultra sensitive fair complexion which becomes more reactive to everything (sun, wind, heat, chemicals) as the years go by. My skin is also a little bi-polar, some dry flaking, but also oily w/ cystic acne . The M2 combo has brought some sanity to my skin, and I'm pleased to report no cystic acne while on this regimen. I only use it 2-3x a week & only at night. Anything more & my skin does react.Word to those M2 serum users who have experienced severe stickiness: I have managed to minimize this by waiting an xtra 10 minutes after cleansing for my skin to dry down. It makes a noticeable difference. If applied immediately after washing & towling off, yeah, it is *very* sticky. I wait another 5 minutes before applying the Refinishing Moisturizer & my skin is very comfortable, & soft to the touch.I like that there are no parabens & have recommended this M2 combo to friends. I only wish the packaging was a litte more 'green' - it seems excessive & is not eligible for the recycling bin.", 'author_name': u'Emcee3'}

reviews: {'date': u'2011-01-25', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Allergy/Sensitivity Relieved', 'review_text': u"I had an allergic reaction to one of the chemotherapy drugs I was infused with. It caused me four trips to the ER because the wheals were so bad and covered my whole body. I needed IV's of steroids to quell the reaction to the drug. It was a constant, every day intrusion of my body. I tried so many different lotions and took oral steroids for almost six months. I have been done with treatment since Sept '10 and still break out daily not to the extent it was during treatment but itchy and daily is still overwhelming. When I saw Sarna Anti-itch lotion on this website I had to try it. Let me tell you, this lotion is so great, it calms my skin as soon as I put it on. Once it is on there is no feeling of it being there it just calms and soaks in without any sticky or greasy feeling. I have purchsed several bottles so that I have it at all times. My granddaughter and one of my son's have sensitive, itchy, and allergic skin just like me so I have purchased a bottle for them too. Relief is finally here for me. It has been a long and very emotional experience but now it is behind me and this lotion has been a blessing. If you have itchy, dry or sensitive skin please get this. I am now ordering a case of it. It is wonderful.", 'author_name': u'JUDEJ'}

reviews: {'date': u'2013-05-27', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Great for post Fraxel Repair/sensitive skin', 'review_text': u"I had an extremely aggressive Fraxel treatment done to my face and i'll be using this for at least 90 days after my laser. I will also always use this after anything rom chemical peels to microdermabrasion/IPL Photofacials....basically anything that stresses the skin. I'm a product junky and use only the best of everything, this is the best cleanser on the market. It's extremely soothing and I'm convinced that much of premature facial aging is due to harsh cleansers. Now If I'm not wearing mineral makeup, or have a ton of eye makeup on, I use Boscia's 'makeup breakup' first THEN follow up with this. Either way, I'll likely keep this in my cabinet and use it 90% of the time until a better product comes along. I follow with Perricone MD's toner thenSkinMedica's TNS Essential serum(all in one miracleproduct) then Elta MD's moisturizer/SPF 46 combo during the day. Once a week I alternate and use a vitamin C serum (25%) also. At night I use this cleanser, same toner, same serum and then SkinCeuticals Retinol refining night cream then TNS dermal repair moisturizer. One helluva routine. I also use an eye cream both am and pm: Peter Thomas Roth. I alternate between several of his eye creams...best on the market.It's a must to use the cleanser, essential serum, spf during the day and retinol at night. You don't have to use anything else but the toner does seem to help these expensive products soak in. I wait at least 2 minutes after each step (except cleansing) to let products work before applying another. My skin is flawless now, used to have terribly textured/acne/oily/large pores/discoloration...Basically I had the worst skin possible and now I'm almost 30 and people think I'm to young to drink! Huge turnaround...I stay out of the sun and get spray tans too.BTW if you want to save a ton of money go for Roc's Retinol creams/serums...some of them include a moisturizer and spf, if you want to use it during the day...either way they are so cheap and have some of the most concentrated over the counter retinol creams out. Remember the higher the retinol, the greater the reaction if your skin is sensitive. Start out low, don't use every night unless you stay with .5% or lower concentration. Which is what I do...Hope this helps!", 'author_name': u'BellaTrainer'}

{'date': u'2011-08-21', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'Love this cleanser...', 'review_text': u"Have used SkinMedica products for a year and love what it's done for my skin. {'date': u'2008-09-11', 'rating_score': u'100.0%', 'rating_title': u'The Ultimate C!', 'review_text': u"After years of Cellex C, then Jan Marini C Esta, then Skinceuticals (several different varieties,) I am hooked on this product.
